sentences.en: Antonio has a contagious enthusiasm for the beautiful aspect of food.
sentences.cn: 安东尼奥对食品赏心悦目这一方面的热情非常有感染性。

sentences.en: Each one of these ancient towns is hauntingly beautiful.
sentences.cn: 这些古镇个个都美得令人难以忘怀。

sentences.en: I think she has many good qualities besides being very beautiful.
sentences.cn: 我觉得她不但长得非常漂亮，而且还有很多优秀品质。

sentences.en: It's been a beautiful evening and you have made it all possible.
sentences.cn: 那是个美好的夜晚，你让一切成为可能。

sentences.en: Its beautiful gardens and parkland are also open to the public.
sentences.cn: 它漂亮的花园和绿地也向公众开放。

sentences.en: Look at that moon. Is that beautiful or what?
sentences.cn: 看看那月亮，它真漂亮，不是吗？

sentences.en: Men swarmed around her, attracted by her beautiful blonde looks.
sentences.cn: 男人们被她金发碧眼的美貌迷得团团转。

sentences.en: One of the prisoners has carved a beautiful wooden chess set.
sentences.cn: 有个犯人刻了一副漂亮的木头象棋。

sentences.en: She was even more beautiful than I had remembered.
She wasn't beautiful. But she was kind of cute.
sentences.cn: 她不漂亮。但她有几分可爱。

sentences.en: That's a beautiful piece of work. You should be proud of it.
sentences.cn: 那件作品非常漂亮，你应当为之自豪。

sentences.en: This Islington shop is a treasure trove of beautiful bridalwear.
sentences.cn: 这家位于伊斯灵顿区的商店里汇聚了各种漂亮的新娘服装。

sentences.en: To me he is the most beautiful child in the world.
sentences.cn: 对我来说，他是世界上最美丽的孩子。

sentences.en: We have a beautiful city and we pray it stays that way.
sentences.cn: 我们的城市很美丽，但愿它能保持下去。

sentences.en: What really makes the book are the beautiful designs.
sentences.cn: 真正让这本书大获成功的是它精美的设计。

sentences.en: Work on the positive, creating beautiful, loving and fulfilling relationships.
sentences.cn: 致力于好的方面，努力营造美好的、友爱的、令人满意的关系。

words.tran_cn: 美；美丽；美人；美好的东西

trans.tran_en: someone or something that is beautiful is extremely attractive to look at
someone or something that is beautiful is extremely attractive to look at
